label: 即位灌頂
本: From Sovereign to Symbol: An Age of Ritual Determinism in Fourteenth Century Japan . Oxford University Press . 2012
見出し読み: そくい かんじょう
見出し読み_mod: そくい かんじょう
説明文: Tantric coronation rites (abhiseka) that largely supplanted, if not entirely replaced, rituals of enthronement. Served to make the monarch a cakravartin. Became particularly common after 1288. See also daijosai.
